Text.Page:
While you've been slaughtering everything that moves, I've been compiling a report of what we've learned and the good we've done.

Report back to the commander. I don't want her thinking I've been loafing on the job.

Well, there's no dross in you. Did you actually read this report?

It's page after page of " killed this" and " killed that."

Impressive. Bloody, but impressive.
